Chapter 3. Running wxGlade

Chapter 3. Running wxGlade

Once the installation of wxGlade is finished successfully, you can start wxGlade either by clicking on the desktop icon, selecting the program from the “Start Menu” or on a command line as described in the section called “Command Line Invocation”.

Known Platforms

wxGlade works on most Unix platforms and Microsoft Windows.
